intro.title: Common Questions
intro.subtitle: Here are answers to questions families often ask. If you need more information, please don't hesitate to contact us.

questions.question: How much does a funeral cost?
questions.answer: Our services start from £1,795 for a simple funeral. We provide transparent pricing and can work within your budget.

questions.question: What happens if someone dies at home?
questions.answer: Call us first on 0151 928 1625. We'll guide you through everything, including contacting the doctor and making arrangements.

questions.question: How long after death is a funeral?
questions.answer: Usually within 1-2 weeks, but this can vary. We'll work with your timeline and any religious or cultural requirements.

questions.question: Can we have the funeral at home?
questions.answer: Yes, we can arrange home funerals. Your loved one can rest at home before the service with appropriate care.

questions.question: What's the difference between burial and cremation?
questions.answer: Burial provides a permanent resting place to visit. Cremation offers flexibility with ashes and is generally less expensive.

questions.question: Do you offer payment plans?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various payment options including installment plans to help spread the cost.
